alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 12:51AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Natchitoches, Sabine Parishes in northwestern Louisiana and eastern Sabine Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Milam to near Toledo Bend Dam. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toledo Bend Dam, Milam, Many, Zwolle, Florien, Fisher, Robeline, Kisatchie, Negreet, Mount Carmel and Columbus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas.
